creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: small bowl on very small foot; dark, somewhat mottled navy blue glaze with ochre, tan, and greenish gradients; lip is brown and rust colored; slightly raised scaly pattern around outside
medium: Jian ware; stoneware with dark brown glaze and hare's-fur markings
title: Tea Bowl with Indented Lip and Hare's Fur markings
